description:
American playwright C.J. Hopkins has been convicted by a German court of likening Covid totalitarianism to Nazi Germany. This will only damage the credibility of the establishment forces who pursued him, says Eugyppius.

The post On the Unjust and Ridiculous Conviction of C.J. Hopkins for Likening Covid Totalitarianism to Nazi Germany appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: On the Unjust and Ridiculous Conviction of C.J. Hopkins for Likening Covid Totalitarianism to Nazi Germany

description:
Lucy Letby was not present when a baby she was convicted of killing was harmed, but the judge in her trial failed to remind the jury of this crucial fact, a BBC investigation has found.

The post Lucy Letby Was Not Working on Day Baby She Was Convicted of Killing was Harmed, BBC Investigation Finds appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Lucy Letby Was Not Working on Day Baby She Was Convicted of Killing was Harmed, BBC Investigation Finds

description:
The Austrian Freedom Party’s victory in this week's election is a harbinger of the death throes of European centrism, says Ralph Schoellhammer – and opposition to mass immigration and Covid lockdowns were key drivers.

The post Austria Shows Us the Death Throes of European Centrism appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Austria Shows Us the Death Throes of European Centrism

description:
Israel invaded Lebanon this morning, its troops entering the hostile country to its north for the first time since the war of 2006. The Telegraph's Adrian Blomfield says it's starting to feel like all-out war.

The post “It’s Starting to Feel Like All-Out War”: Israel Invades Lebanon appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: “It’s Starting to Feel Like All-Out War”: Israel Invades Lebanon

description:
The Government is hiding the truth about crime committed by migrants, Tory leadership candidate Robert Jenrick has said, accusing officials of an "institutional cover-up" that the British public deserves to know about.

The post Migrant Crime Data “Covered Up”, Says Robert Jenrick as He Calls for Transparency appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Migrant Crime Data “Covered Up”, Says Robert Jenrick as He Calls for Transparency

description:
As the anniversary of the October 7th massacre approaches, Nick Rendell gives a perspective on the scale of the deaths by showing that the number of 15-44 year-olds who died dwarfs weekly deaths over the past five years.

The post A Perspective on the Scale of the October 7th Massacre appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: A Perspective on the Scale of the October 7th Massacre

description:
Lembit Opik has been a professional speech coach for 35 years, but he's never seen a gaffe as bad as Sir Keir’s use of the word "sausages" to mean hostages. But he's Winston Churchill compared to Ed Miliband, says Lembit.

The post This Government’s Credibility is Blowin’ in the Wind appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: This Government’s Credibility is Blowin’ in the Wind

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
